Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index.storage

Class FailureStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index.storage.FailureStorage
  • public class FailureStorage
extends Object
    Helper class for storing a failure message that happens during an OutOfDisk situation in a pre-allocated file

    • Method Detail

      • reserveForIndex

        public void reserveForIndex()
                     throws IOException
        Create/reserve an empty failure file for the given indexId. This will overwrite any pre-existing failure file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the failure file could not be created

      • clearForIndex

        public void clearForIndex()
        Delete failure file for the given index id

      • loadIndexFailure

        public String loadIndexFailure()
        Returns:
        the failure, if any. Otherwise null marking no failure.

      • storeIndexFailure

        public void storeIndexFailure​(String failure)
                       throws IOException
        Store failure in failure file for index with the given id
        Parameters:
        failure - message describing the failure that needs to be stored
        Throws:
        IOException - if the failure could not be stored
